## Maintenance Type
- [ ] Code cleanup
- [ ] Dependency update
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring
- [ ] Performance optimization
- [ ] Security update
- [ ] Other

## Description
A clear and concise description of the maintenance task.

## Scope of Work
Describe what needs to be done:

## Expected Outcome
What should be the result after this maintenance is completed?

## Additional Context
Add any other context or information about the maintenance task here.

## Priority Keywords
Please include one of these keywords if applicable: critical, urgent, production, outage, important, high, blocking, medium, normal, low, nice-to-have, minor
